channel.title: Small minigame prob
channel.description: yea, i have the entire thing coded.. but i cant seem to make it add points to the new int i made: [code] character-newarmmini = 0; [/code] i need the code to make the npc # 912 to add points to that.. and to whitch file would i add??

item.title: Small minigame prob
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

Npchandler.java

Edit: This is what I used for my barrows, edit it how you need.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2029) {
temp.Torag = 1;
temp.Barrows += 1;
temp.isBT = false;
}

Read full topic
